identity.name: RentAll
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Airbnb cleanliness with Pinterest discovery.
Emotion First: Every interaction builds trust.
Content is King: Photos of items are the heroes.
Zoom In: High-fidelity details of rental items.
Negative Space: Generous padding to prevent clutter.

typography.instructions: Use Plus Jakarta Sans for all headings to give a friendly, geometric, modern feel. Use Inter for body text for maximum legibility. Avoid generic 'sans-serif' fallbacks without loading the fonts.

usage_rules: Primary Color (Terracotta): Use ONLY for primary CTAs (Book Now, Search) and key brand moments.
Secondary Color (Sage): Use for trust indicators, success states, and verified badges.
Background: Use 'Stone 50' (#FAFAF9) instead of pure white for a warmer, more organic feel.
Text: Use 'Stone 900' (#1C1917) for headings and 'Stone 600' for body. Never pure black.
Borders: Subtle 'Stone 200' (#E7E5E4) for cards and dividers.

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors and textures.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the background (opacity 0.02) to add tactility.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border border-white/20' for sticky headers and floating map controls.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use py-16 or py-24 for section spacing. Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grids.

grids.bento: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6 auto-rows-[300px]
grids.listings: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-stone-200 text-stone-900 hover:bg-stone-50 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all

cards.listing: group relative bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden border border-stone-100 hover:border-stone-300 transition-all
cards.category: relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-stone-100 hover:bg-stone-200 transition-colors cursor-pointer

components.inputs: h-12 rounded-xl border-stone-200 bg-white px-4 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all
components.map_marker: bg-white text-stone-900 font-bold px-3 py-1 rounded-full shadow-lg border border-stone-200 hover:scale-110 transition-transform cursor-pointer

hero_background.description: Bright modern living room for hero section background

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use Stone-600 or darker on Stone-50 backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using the primary color.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Specify properties.
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for headings and 'Inter' for body.
